lead_paragraph: John M. McHugh said that it would be “counterproductive” to take disciplinary action against service members who had told him they are gay in conversations he initiated about the policy.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

snippet: John M. McHugh said that it would be “counterproductive” to take disciplinary action against service members who had told him they are gay in conversations he initiated about the policy.

headline.main: Secretary of the Army Says He Will Not Pursue ‘Don’t Ask, Don’t Tell’ Discharges
headline.print_headline: Secretary of the Army Says He Will Not Pursue ‘Don’t Ask, Don’t Tell’ Discharges
